chooseAreaTitle: Which Area would you like to look for Communities?
chooseAreaSubtitle: Any pick can be easily changed afterwards in the Settings Section.

filtersTitleMain: In here, you can refine your search!
filtersTitleActivities: Choose one or more Activities that fits your interests!

nowhatsnew: Sorry, there are no news in {areaName} at this time.

nostories: Sorry, there are no stories yet in {areaName}.
numberofgroups: {num, plural, =0 {No groups yet} =1 {One group} other {# groups}}
numberofstories: {num, plural, =0 {No stories yet} =1 {One story} other {# stories}}
numberofcommunities: {num, plural, =0 {No communities yet} =1 {One community} other {# communities}}
numberofmembers: {num, plural, =0 {No one yet} =1 {One person} other {# people}}
numberofphotos: {num, plural, =0 {No photos yet} =1 {One photo} other {# photos}}
activity_street_label: Where will it be / Where will you meet?
